flawed_nl_solution:
Both apple trees will be 10 feet wide at maturity so they will be 2*10 = <<10*2=20>>20 feet wide
Quinton will need to leave 12 feet between these 2 trees so the apple trees will take up 20+12 = 32 feet
Both peach trees will be 12 feet wide at maturity so they will be 2*12 = <<12*2=24>>24 feet wide
Quinton will need to leave 15 feet between these 2 trees so the peach trees will take up 24+15 = 40 feet
Together, the apple trees will take up 32 feet and the peach trees will take up 40 feet so they will take 32+40 = <<32+40=72>>72 feet

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 39, not 40. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
